attributes.action: unban Self Balancing Scooters and similar vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The ban on Self-balancing scooters is unfair and unjust, such as the Segway Human Transporter (HT), are powered by electricity and transport a passenger standing on a platform propelled on two or more wheels. They are capable of speeds up to 12 mph (20 km/h).

rejection.details: The title must include a call of action.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
